content: the rustic village christmas ornament crochet pattern has a traditional christmas feel making it an ornament that you will want to hang on your tree year after year these crochet christmas ornaments are simple yet beautiful to me they have the feel and appeal of a country patch work quilt and depending on which colour combinations you use easy ornament can look unique and distinguished from the other a free written copy of this crochet pattern can be found on my ad supported website https //richtexturescrochet com/rustic-village-christmas-ornament-crochet-pattern/ a free video tutorial for this pattern can be found on my youtube channel https //www youtube com/c/richtexturescrochet/ skill level easy gauge 20 single_crochet x 16 row = 4 inches finished size approximately 3 5 in diameter yarn dishie by knitpicks/wecrochet® 190 yds 100g 100% cotton 4 worsted weight you will need about 30 yards each colour per ornament colours shown swan and douglas fir hook size e/4 3 5 mm hook notions yarn needle
